messages.content: Where is my shipment?
Your shipment is currently in transit.
Has my package been delivered?
Yes, your package was delivered successfully.
Why is my package delayed?
Your package is delayed due to weather conditions.
What is the estimated delivery date?
Your package is expected to arrive on June 5th.
Has my return been processed?
Your return has been successfully processed and refunded.
Can I change my delivery address?
You can update your address within 24 hours of placing the order.
My package was marked as delivered but I didn't receive it.
Please check with your neighbors or contact support for assistance.
Is my package insured?
Yes, your package is covered under our standard shipping insurance.
Why was my package returned to sender?
Your package was returned due to an incorrect address.
What time will my package be delivered?
Delivery times vary, but it should arrive between 9 AM and 7 PM.
